channel.title: Item requires level BLANK
channel.description: If I want to make a item require, for example, 50 cooking to wear, how would i do so. Where would it go.

item.title: Item requires level BLANK
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

Add it where it goes in your specific server… If you would like a more specific answer, post your base/revision at least.

Right now your question is [size=14pt]“how do i turn it on?”[/size] where IT can be anything in the universe you can turn on >_<

Some other similar examples:
Where does the spark-plug go?
Where do i plug this in?
What is the answer to #17? - That is a good damn question.
Where is it?
Where is downtown?

The point is, everything is RELATIVE to your situation. If we don’t know what you are asking about, what are we supposed to help with?

Granted people are trying to tell you to add a means of adding a way to control it - Then again no one can tell you what to do.

Read full topic

item.title: Item requires level BLANK
item.dc:creator: @JCor9 JCor9
item.description:
@JCor9 wrote:

Didn’t say they were good. Just easy way to do it

Read full topic

item.title: Item requires level BLANK
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

[quote=“JCor9, post:5, topic:546320”][quote author=Dan0194 link=topic=665219.msg4447030#msg4447030 date=1409351308]

Well if you don’t have 50 cooking it would go in your inventory. If you did it would go into it’s wield slot.

Hope that helps.

For real though, you need to ask what you’re trying to do better. We know nothing about your server, how could we possibly help?
Refer to the link in my signature, not the quote.

he want to know how he would make it so an items requires a level to wield sorta like this

if (itemName.contains("Cooking Gloves")) { c.cookLevelReq = **; }

Not sure but this is what i got from it

I’m sure he has something like item.cfg where he can put the required level because all those if statements are going to be pretty bad.
[/quote]

item.cfg has nothing to do with editing required levels…

Thats just how you change the stats (str,pray,def bonus)[/quote]

Then add something to load it externally. I’m not trying to be a dick all those if statements are horrible.

Read full topic
